targets.rawSql:
WITH family_param AS (
    SELECT param_id, enum_id
    FROM parameters
    WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
      AND param_name = 'ProductFamily'
),

serial_param AS (
    SELECT param_id
    FROM parameters
    WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
      AND param_name = 'SerialNumber'
),

latest_product_family AS (
    SELECT e.member_name AS product_family
    FROM family_param p
    JOIN data d
      ON d.param_id = p.param_id
     AND d.instrument_id = $instrument
     AND d.value_num > 0
     AND d.time > now() - interval '10 days'
    JOIN enum_values e
      ON e.enum_id = p.enum_id
     AND e.value = d.value_num
    ORDER BY d.time DESC
    LIMIT 1
),

latest_serial AS (
    SELECT d.value_num AS serial
    FROM data d
    JOIN serial_param sp
    ON sp.param_id = d.param_id
    WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument
     AND d.value_num > 0
     AND d.time > now() - interval '10 days'
    ORDER BY d.time DESC
    LIMIT 1
),

instrument_times AS (
    SELECT
        (SELECT time FROM data d WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 1) AS oldest_data,
        (SELECT time FROM data d WHERE d.instrument_id = $instrument ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) AS latest_data
)

SELECT 
    i.name AS "Name",
    ls.serial AS "Serial",
    i.serial AS "D-number",
    i.model AS "Model",
    lpf.product_family AS "Product family",
    i.server AS "Server IP",
    i.ds_version AS "Data services",
    it.oldest_data AS "Oldest data",
    it.latest_data AS "Latest data"
FROM instruments i
CROSS JOIN latest_product_family lpf
CROSS JOIN latest_serial ls
CROSS JOIN instrument_times it
WHERE i.id = $instrument;

SELECT
  'TEM server' AS name,
  CASE d.value_num
    WHEN 1 THEN 'Up'
    WHEN 0 THEN 'Down'
  END AS value_num,
  d.time
FROM
  data d
WHERE
  d.instrument_id = $instrument
  AND d.param_id = $param_id_server
ORDER BY
  d.time DESC
LIMIT
  1

WITH target_param AS (
  SELECT param_id, enum_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument AND param_id = $param_id_feg
)


SELECT
  'FEG' AS name,
  ev.member_name AS value_num,
  d.time
FROM
  data d
JOIN target_param tp ON tp.param_id = d.param_id
JOIN enum_values ev ON ev.enum_id = tp.enum_id
WHERE
  d.instrument_id = $instrument
  AND d.param_id = $param_id_feg
  AND d.value_num = ev.value
ORDER BY
  d.time DESC
LIMIT
  1

WITH target_param AS (
  SELECT param_id, enum_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument AND param_id = $param_id_ht
)


SELECT
  'HT' AS name,
  ev.member_name AS value_num,
  d.time
FROM
  data d
JOIN target_param tp ON tp.param_id = d.param_id
JOIN enum_values ev ON ev.enum_id = tp.enum_id
WHERE
  d.instrument_id = $instrument
  AND d.param_id = $param_id_ht
  AND d.value_num = ev.value
ORDER BY
  d.time DESC
LIMIT
  1

WITH target_param AS (

WITH target_param AS (

WITH target_param AS (
  SELECT param_id, enum_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument AND param_id = $param_id_autoloader
)


SELECT
  'Autoloader' AS name,
  ev.member_name AS value_num,
  d.time
FROM
  data d
JOIN target_param tp ON tp.param_id = d.param_id
JOIN enum_values ev ON ev.enum_id = tp.enum_id

WITH target_param AS (
  SELECT param_id, enum_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument AND param_id = $param_id_tempctrl
)


SELECT
  'Temperature' AS name,
  ev.member_name AS value_num,
  d.time
FROM
  data d
JOIN target_param tp ON tp.param_id = d.param_id
JOIN enum_values ev ON ev.enum_id = tp.enum_id
WHERE
  d.instrument_id = $instrument

LIMIT

WITH target_param AS (
  SELECT param_id, enum_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument AND param_id = $param_id_filter
)
SELECT
  'Energy filter' AS name,
  ev.member_name AS value_num,
  d.time
FROM target_param tp
JOIN data d
  ON d.param_id = tp.param_id
  AND d.instrument_id = $instrument
JOIN enum_values ev
  ON ev.enum_id = tp.enum_id
  AND d.value_num = ev.value
WHERE $param_id_filter != 0
ORDER BY d.time DESC
LIMIT 1

WITH target_params AS (
  SELECT component, param_id, enum_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'Availability'
    AND display_name IN ('Camera availability', 'Availability')
),
latest_data AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (param_id) *
  FROM data
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_id IN (SELECT param_id FROM target_params)
  ORDER BY param_id, time DESC
)
SELECT
  'Detector: ' || tp.component AS name,
  ev.member_name AS value_num,
  ld.time
FROM target_params tp
JOIN latest_data ld
  ON ld.param_id = tp.param_id
JOIN enum_values ev
  ON ev.enum_id = tp.enum_id
  AND ld.value_num = ev.value
ORDER BY ld.time DESC;

list.definition:
SELECT
  id AS __value,
  name || ' [' || model || '] (' || serial || ')' AS __text
FROM instruments
ORDER BY name;
list.name: instrument
list.query:
SELECT
  id AS __value,
  name || ' [' || model || '] (' || serial || ')' AS __text
FROM instruments
ORDER BY name;

list.definition:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'Value'
    AND component = 'Server'
    AND subsystem = 'Software'
list.name: param_id_server
list.query:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'Value'
    AND component = 'Server'
    AND subsystem = 'Software'

list.definition:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'FegState'
    AND display_name = 'Feg State'
    AND subsystem IN ('MdlGunBrick', 'MdlTemFegBrick')
list.name: param_id_feg
list.query:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'FegState'
    AND display_name = 'Feg State'
    AND subsystem IN ('MdlGunBrick', 'MdlTemFegBrick')

list.definition:
SELECT
  param_id
FROM
  parameters
WHERE
  instrument_id = $instrument
  AND (
    (
      param_name = 'HTTankState'
      AND component = 'HTTank'
      AND subsystem = 'MdlGunBrick'
    )
    OR (
      param_name = 'HTTankAvailable'
      AND component = 'HTTank'
      AND subsystem = 'MdlHighTensionBrick'
    )
  )
list.name: param_id_ht
list.query:
SELECT
  param_id
FROM
  parameters
WHERE
  instrument_id = $instrument
  AND (
    (
      param_name = 'HTTankState'
      AND component = 'HTTank'
      AND subsystem = 'MdlGunBrick'
    )
    OR (
      param_name = 'HTTankAvailable'
      AND component = 'HTTank'
      AND subsystem = 'MdlHighTensionBrick'
    )
  )

list.definition:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name IN ('Status', 'CompuStageStatus')
    AND subsystem IN ('Compustage', 'MdlSmc')
list.name: param_id_stage
list.query:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name IN ('Status', 'CompuStageStatus')
    AND subsystem IN ('Compustage', 'MdlSmc')

list.definition:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name in ('OpticsOperationalState', 'Optics_OperationalState')
list.name: param_id_optics
list.query:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name in ('OpticsOperationalState', 'Optics_OperationalState')

list.definition:
SELECT COALESCE(
         (SELECT param_id
          FROM parameters
          WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
            AND subsystem = 'EnergyFilterBrick'
            AND param_name = 'EnergyFilterIsAvailable'
          LIMIT 1), 0) AS param_id;
list.name: param_id_filter
list.query:
SELECT COALESCE(
         (SELECT param_id
          FROM parameters
          WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
            AND subsystem = 'EnergyFilterBrick'
            AND param_name = 'EnergyFilterIsAvailable'
          LIMIT 1), 0) AS param_id;

list.definition:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'AutoloaderUpStatus'
list.name: param_id_autoloader
list.query:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'AutoloaderUpStatus'

list.definition:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'TemperatureControlUpStatus'
list.name: param_id_tempctrl
list.query:
SELECT param_id
  FROM parameters
  WHERE instrument_id = $instrument
    AND param_name = 'TemperatureControlUpStatus'
